data.name: Magical Girls Second Magic - High difficulty stage addition
data.detailed_description: This pack allows you to play "3 stages". The three additional stages are "Rosa Haula", "Adrianna Diaz", and "Liselot Beijer". Clear the more difficult stages and get gorgeous character illustrations!
data.about_the_game: This pack allows you to play "3 stages". The three additional stages are "Rosa Haula", "Adrianna Diaz", and "Liselot Beijer". Clear the more difficult stages and get gorgeous character illustrations!
data.short_description: Additional stages are impossible to clear! High Difficulty Stage Pack" is now available!
data.supported_languages: English, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Japanese
